titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Desmodur R-E.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Desmodur R-E.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of Desmodur R-E, and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such article.
